The video was shared on Facebook: Twitter, and YouTube with an identical claim, indicating widespread circulation.
The video was recorded in January 2020: according to local police, debunking the claim that it was related to the Hindu-Muslim clashes in Delhi.
The video shows an exhumation after a ma: confirming that it was a family matter and not a political incident.
Additional sources: including a local news website and regional Bengali-language news websites, reported on the incident, providing further evidence of its authenticity.
